product.description: Ride like a pro on the Burton® Men's Sherlock Snowboard! Easily conquer rough terrain with Smooth Ride technology and Frostbite Edges. Squeezebox design gives you ultimate performance by balancing thicker core sections with thin and flexible sections to energize the tip and tail while keeping the board stable and easy to manipulate. With twin-like shape to provide control in a variety of conditions, Sherlock performs anywhere you want to go!
product.name: Burton Men's Sherlock Snowboard 2012-2013
product.features:
• Feel: 5, based on a scale of 1 (softest) to 10 (stiffest)
  • Gondola package: Lighter, faster & stronger. More air, quicker turns & more fun regardless of terrain and conditions.
  • The Channel: Offers more stance options and compatibility than other mounting systems
  • BEND: Flying V™ blends camber and rocker. The rocker between and outside your feet gives you increased playfulness & float, while subtle camber zones beneath your feet focus edge control to give you more power & pop in your turns.
  • SHAPE: Twin-like - gives you better float & control in varying conditions whether you're riding regular or switch with the freestyle feel of a twin shape
  • FLEX: Directional - versatile, features increased pop in the tail & a more resilient nose to allow you to maintain control through varying terrains & conditions
  • CORE: Super Fly™ with Dualzone™ EGD™ - lighter for more pop; a combination of hard & soft woods lowers weight and gives you better snap and response
  • FIBERGLASS: Triax™ fiberglass with Carbon I-Beam™ - versatile flex and response for everything from mini to mega shred
  • BASE: Sintered base is durable and very porous, which gives you more durability and better wax absorption for improved glide
  • SIDEWALLS: 10:45™ sidewalls' extra-meaty, dual angle geometry results in great impact absorption
  • Smooth Ride - internal dampening allows you to ride faster through rough terrain with more control and less impact on your body by cushioning negative vibrations and shock
  • Squeezebox - improves performance by balancing a thicker, more powerful core with thinner, more flexible sections. Your energy transfers out from under your feet to energize the tip & tail, while keeping the board stable and easy to manipulate.
  • Side Effects - longer surface area at the tip & tail contact points to improve edge-hold and allow the board to plane more eas
